title: bcquiet
author: bcquiet
content: What happened:: I registered on their site 18.06, I've made deposit of 10mBTC and placed it on various pre-match events. I made second deposit of 12mBTC same day, I was live betting for rest of the day. So by betting on 5 events CS:GO and football (all live singles) I managed to end the day with a balance of 50.69mBTCI decided to withdraw 30.69mBTC, and leave 20mBTC for futher playing there. I woke up next day and I saw that withdrawal did not come nor I could not log into my account. I contacted live support then, what is up with my account, they told me to write mail to their "security team".Within a few hours, I received an email with information that terrified me. Their team decided to end their relationship with me and close my account without giving me any reason or possibility to withdraw my funds. UPDATE while writing this: It seems that I can log into my account again, they refunded all my bets and I have only deposit amount of my account.So basically they stole 28.69mBTC, everything I made over this day they decided to not pay me out, I bet on 7 events at all and every bet got refunded, I did not use any software or I did not abuse any bug with odds, most of bets were live-bets based on what I saw watching cs:go matches.Scammers Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=2835882Reference Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5267172.0Amount Scammed: 50.69mBTC 28.69mBTCPayment Method: BTCProof of Payment: https://i.imgur.com/oDaBhp7.pngPM/Chat Logs: https://i.imgur.com/PYy49fN.pngAdditional Notes: https://i.imgur.com/8DH2A0q.pnghttps://i.imgur.com/nVjoAld.png

Try at least go to 3 casino reviewers, other community forums such as reddit and this forum to check individuals experience, complaints, good reviews because obviously, they are one of the worst casino these days to ignore.Trustpilot is a good place to read negative comments and get a general impression of the platform. If the platform is without evaluation or all evaluations are positive, this is an indication of suspicious activity and it is better to avoid that platform. If there are negative comments, look at them. If they are related to fraud, this is also a negative indicator. Otherwise, review those comments and consider them as part of the platform evaluation.Trustpilot is an indicator to exclude services, not to trust them.
